entry.def: You use heaven-sent to describe something such as an opportunity which is unexpected, but which is very welcome because it occurs at just the right time.

example.ex: It will be a heaven-sent opportunity to prove himself.
example.tran: 这将是他证明自己的天赐良机。

means.word_mean: 1. peculiarly fortunate or appropriate; as if by divine intervention;
